package.name: Community Builder
package.description: Social websites go far beyond Facebook look-a-likes and CB has literally hundreds of built-in features and can be extended with extra (free or commercial) add-ons from the CB Team and other parties that will help you realize your very own - tailored to your specific needs - social networking website.

package.name: Community Builder
package.description: Social websites go far beyond Facebook look-a-likes and CB has literally hundreds of built-in features and can be extended with extra (free or commercial) add-ons from the CB Team and other parties that will help you realize your very own - tailored to your specific needs - social networking website.

package.name: CB Package Builder Bot
package.description: Works with the CB Package Builder plugin and lets you embed package and preset information in Joomla content. General substitution format is [cbpkb:packages package="#" /] and [cbpkb:presets preset="#" /] and there are many extra options to display only specific content.

package.name: CB Redirect Bot
package.description: Extend Joomlas redirect component with handy REGEXP supported full or partial URL rewriting rules for 404 URLs. Take back control of your 404 redirects!

package.name: CB Replacer Bot
package.description: Create handy substitution string and REGEX placeholders with this Joomla plugin and place them in your articles. This way you simply change placeholder mapping once and it will propagate to all content articles.

package.name: CB Author Bot
package.description: Joomla plugin that links article author name to CB user profile page. Great way for your users to learn more about specific authors and explore other author related content.

package.name: CB Content Bot
package.description: Show CB fields or CB Tabs in your Joomla content articles. You can even use CB substitutions to show or hide article content based on viewer CB field values.

package.name: CB Search Bot
package.description: Use the Joomla search function to find CB user profiles based on CB field data of profiles. CB Privacy settings respected during searching. This is a Joomla plugin.

package.name: CB GroupJive Search Bot
package.description: This Joomla plugin extends the Joomla search box to also search in CB GroupJive groups.

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Bot
package.description: This Joomla Plugin integrates with your Joomla website and lets CBSubs control access to your content.

package.name: CB Gallery Bot
package.description: Joomla plugin for CB Gallery that lets you put gallery media in your Joomla content articles.

package.name: CB Package Builder Bot
package.description: Works with the CB Package Builder plugin and lets you embed package and preset information in Joomla content. General substitution format is [cbpkb:packages package="#" /] and [cbpkb:presets preset="#" /] and there are many extra options to display only specific content.

package.name: CB Redirect Bot
package.description: Extend Joomlas redirect component with handy REGEXP supported full or partial URL rewriting rules for 404 URLs. Take back control of your 404 redirects!

package.name: CB Replacer Bot
package.description: Create handy substitution string and REGEX placeholders with this Joomla plugin and place them in your articles. This way you simply change placeholder mapping once and it will propagate to all content articles.

package.name: CB Author Bot
package.description: Joomla plugin that links article author name to CB user profile page. Great way for your users to learn more about specific authors and explore other author related content.

package.name: CB Search Bot

package.name: CB GroupJive Search Bot

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Bot
package.description: This Joomla Plugin integrates with your Joomla website and lets CBSubs control access to your content.

package.name: CB Gallery Bot
package.description: Joomla plugin for CB Gallery that lets you put gallery media in your Joomla content articles.

package.name: CB Package Builder Module
package.description: Display CB Package Builder packages or presets in a Joomla module position.

package.name: CB Gallery Module
package.description: CB Gallery module lets you display a gallery in a Joomla module position.

package.name: CB Activity Module
package.description: Show activity stream in a Joomla module.

package.name: CB Content Module
package.description: Push custom HTML code with CB content in a Joomla module. CB substitutions are supported and you can also push css, javascript and jquery to your page headers. Very powerful module can basically replace the Joomla custom HTML module.

package.name: CB ProfileBook Module
package.description: Joomla module that shows latest profile book posts.

package.name: CB GroupJive Module
package.description: This Joomla module displays CB GroupJive group related data.

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Module
package.description: Joomla module that quickly displays available CBSubs plan purchases or upgrades to logged in user or anonymous (not logge in) users.

package.name: CB Package Builder Module
package.description: Display CB Package Builder packages or presets in a Joomla module position.

package.name: CB Gallery Module
package.description: CB Gallery module lets you display a gallery in a Joomla module position.

package.name: CB Activity Module
package.description: Show activity stream in a Joomla module.

package.name: CB Content Module
package.description: Push custom HTML code with CB content in a Joomla module. CB substitutions are supported and you can also push css, javascript and jquery to your page headers. Very powerful module can basically replace the Joomla custom HTML module.

package.name: CB ProfileBook Module
package.description: Joomla module that shows latest profile book posts.

package.name: CB GroupJive Module
package.description: This Joomla module displays CB GroupJive group related data.

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Module
package.description: Joomla module that quickly displays available CBSubs plan purchases or upgrades to logged in user or anonymous (not logge in) users.

package.name: MyCommunity
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean community look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Coolness
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean cool look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Flexistrap
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a flexible look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Funlite
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean colorful look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: MyCommunity
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean community look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Coolness
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean cool look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Flexistrap
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a flexible look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: Funlite
package.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean colorful look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

package.name: CB Package Builder
package.description: Most powerful and flexible file download solution for Joomla. This CB plugin lets you transform your digital files into packages that can only be downloaded by authorized users. Joomla ACL is supported along with built in conditions (based on user CB field values) can be used for download authorization. CB Packager Bot, CBSubs Packager Bot and CB Packager module also available.

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions
package.description: This is the main CB plugin that is needed to add paid or free subscriptions to your Joomla/CB powered website. Other optional plugins can also be installed if needed for your business use case.

package.name: CBSubs Package Builder
package.description: CBSubs integration plugin for the CB Package Builder. It lets you protect a package or preset an require a CBSubs subscription to download.

package.name: CB Activity
package.description: Adds interactive walls where users can share their thoughts and happenings and engage in online discussions through comments. There is also a CB Activity module available to display stream in Joomla module. Combined with CB Auto Actions (separate CB plugin) to automatically push profile updates and forum posts to wall.

package.name: CB AntiSpam
package.description: Human challenge your CB forms (registration, login, forgotten password, email messaging) with Captcha image with audio playback and refresh button (also supports recaptcha and question mode). Automated blocking of offenders, limit account sharing and more features.

package.name: CB Auto Actions
package.description: Configure workflow related tasks around your community without coding. Send emails, private messages, update field values, change Joomla ACL group, execute database queries and even more actions when a specific event happens. Powerful tool to make awesome things happen in your community.

package.name: CB Auto Welcome
package.description: Send personalized email or private messages to your users when they join your website. Great way to welcome your new users and get them up to speed with your website. Also supports automated connection requests.

package.name: CB Conditional
package.description: Dynamically show or hide CB fields or entire tabs depending on other field data. Great way to personalize your CB registration form and user profiles for your community. Very powerful concept lets you fine tune data entry.

package.name: CB Connect
package.description: Let hundreds of millions of Facebook, Twitter, Google, Linkedin, Windows Live, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, Reddit, Twitch, Stack Exchange, Pinterest, Amazon, Yahoo, Paypal, Discus, WordPress, and Meetup users to directly and comfortably sign-in to your Community Builder powered website.

package.name: CB Core Fields Ajax
package.description: Make any core CB field be Ajax powered for inline editing (no need to edit profile). Install, publish and configure the fields you want to be inline editable.

package.name: CB Footer Removal
package.description: Authorization to remove all Powered by Community Builder footer links from all your websites for CB 2.x.

package.name: CB Gallery
package.description: Image, video, music and file galleries can be added by members in their profiles. Easy and simple with powerful quota system. Media can also be moderated before final publication.

package.name: CB Google Translate
package.description: This plugin will add a language drop-down selector to your CB Login module and translate your website using google service. Very useful for multi-language audiences.

package.name: CB Gravatar Field
package.description: Use your Gravatar images as a CB field based on email address of user. You can specify default image to show if user does not have Gravatar account.

package.name: CB Invites
package.description: Empower your members to invite their friends to your website. Easy to configure. Lets your members send personalized invitations to their friends with unique invitation codes.

package.name: CB Last Views Tab
package.description: Add a new tab to your profiles to let members see who has been visiting their profile! Also has administrative view with filtering.

package.name: CB Privacy
package.description: Extensive privacy controls for members and administrators. Applies to any CB field and CB Tab. Lets users remove their account by themselves and many more features.

package.name: CB Profile Update Logger
package.description: Keep track of who changed what and when in their user profile. This script will produce a FILO list of profile updates for each user profile. Email notifications are also sent to CB Moderators on each profile update action.

package.name: CB ProfileBook
package.description: Guestbook, blog and/or wall tabs can be added to profiles. Let your members communicate with this powerful 3-in-1 add-on. Package includes Latest Entries module.

package.name: CB Progress Field
package.description: This plugin allows you to create a CB progress field to show your members what their profile completeness progress is. Allows you to select fields to track and shows a nice progress bar. Create as many progress fields as you want.

package.name: CB Code Field
package.description: Lets you execute your PHP code and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported. You can also chain fields to force re-execution or PHP code when a field value is updated.

package.name: CB Query Field
package.description: Lets you grab data using a database query and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported and you can also validate entries of existing fields against database queries.

package.name: CB Reconfirm Email
package.description: Force users to reconfirm email each time they change their CB user profile email address. Users can revert change from their old email address or finalize confirmation from new email address.

package.name: CB Template Changer
package.description: Allow users to change the profile CB template as they please. Users can select if profile setting is to apply only for them or even for all users viewing user's profile.

package.name: CB GroupJive
package.description: Take your Community to the next social level by empowering your users to organize themselves into common interest groups. Sit back and watch your community interact, socialize and expand your community by inviting their friends to their groups and your website. This is the main CB GroupJive plugin.

package.name: CB GroupJive About
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive About plugin that renders the tooltip description for each group.

package.name: CB GroupJive Events
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Events plugin that supports the events tab functionality for groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive File
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Files plugin that supports the group file sharing functionality.

package.name: CB GroupJive Forums
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Forum plugin that integrates with the Kunena forum extension (installed separately) giving private forum discussions for group members.

package.name: CB GroupJive Photo
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Photo plugin that supports photo sharing in groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive Video
package.description: This is the GroupJive Video plugin that supports video sharing in groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive Wall
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Wall plugin that supports wall discussions in groups.

package.name: CBSubs Rounded Template
package.description: This is the rounded template plugin for CBSubs. It lets you change the look of your plan offerings.

package.name: CBSubs AcyMailing
package.description: This is a CBSubs integration plugin for the AcyMailing newsletter extension.

package.name: CBSubs CB Fields
package.description: This is the CBSubs Integration Plugin for CB Fields. It integrates with CB and lets you change the values of a CB Field based on subscription activations/deactivations.

package.name: CBSubs Content
package.description: This is the CBSubs Integration plugin for Joomla content, It lets you protect Joomla content requiring specific plan subscriptions to access. The CBSubs bot (Joomla plugin) is needed to make this protection work.

package.name: CBSubs Email
package.description: This is the CBSubs Email Integration plugin. It extends the email notification functionality of CBSubs to support more subscription related events.

package.name: CBSubs Fields Tabs Protection
package.description: This is the CBSubs Fields/Tabs Protection Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB and lets you protect CB Tabs and Fields to require specific CBSubs Plans for viewing or access.

package.name: CBSubs Folder Access
package.description: This is the CBSubs Folder Access Integration plugin. Lets CBSubs protect access to webserver folders (apache server).

package.name: CBSubs Google Analytics
package.description: CBSubs Google Analytics Integration Plugin. It integrates with Google Analytics services letting it track your business traffic.

package.name: CBSubs GroupJive
package.description: CBSubs GroupJive Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB GroupJive and lets you automatically add users to specific GroupJive groups based on a CBSubs plan subscription.

package.name: CBSubs iDevAffiliate
package.description: CBSubs idev affiliate Integration Plugin. It integrates with the Joomla idev affiliates extension.

package.name: CBSubs Mailer
package.description: CBSubs Mailer Plugin. Adds automated, programmable, personal email messaging functionality to your CBSubs Solution environment. Needs CBSubs Tax plugin to function.

package.name: CBSubs Piwiki
package.description: CBSubs piwiki Integration Plugin. Integrates with the open-source piwiki script.

package.name: CBSubs Plan Image
package.description: CBSubs Plan Image Integration Plugin. Integrates with CB and adds a new plan image field type.

package.name: CBSubs Post Affiliate Pro
package.description: CBSubs Postaffilate Pro Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Promotions
package.description: CBSubs Promotions Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs SQL Actions
package.description: CBSubs SQL Actions Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Tax
package.description: CBSubs Tax Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs URL
package.description: CBSubs URL Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs CCBill
package.description: CBSubs CCBill Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel
package.description: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs eWay
package.description: CBSubs eWay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Google Checkout
package.description: CBSubs Google Checkout Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus
package.description: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs PayPal Advanced
package.description: CBSubs Paypal Advanced Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs PayPal Pro
package.description: CBSubs Paypal Pro Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Payza
package.description: CBSubs Payza Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs QuickPay
package.description: CBSubs QuickPay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Skrill
package.description: CBSubs Skrill Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay
package.description: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs 2Checkout
package.description: CBSubs TwhoCheckout Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs World Pay
package.description: CBSubs World Pay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CB Package Builder
package.description: Most powerful and flexible file download solution for Joomla. This CB plugin lets you transform your digital files into packages that can only be downloaded by authorized users. Joomla ACL is supported along with built in conditions (based on user CB field values) can be used for download authorization. CB Packager Bot, CBSubs Packager Bot and CB Packager module also available.

package.name: CB Paid Subscriptions
package.description: This is the main CB plugin that is needed to add paid or free subscriptions to your Joomla/CB powered website. Other optional plugins can also be installed if needed for your business use case.

package.name: CBSubs Package Builder
package.description: CBSubs integration plugin for the CB Package Builder. It lets you protect a package or preset an require a CBSubs subscription to download.

package.name: CB Activity
package.description: Adds interactive walls where users can share their thoughts and happenings and engage in online discussions through comments. There is also a CB Activity module available to display stream in Joomla module. Combined with CB Auto Actions (separate CB plugin) to automatically push profile updates and forum posts to wall.

package.name: CB AntiSpam
package.description: Human challenge your CB forms (registration, login, forgotten password, email messaging) with Captcha image with audio playback and refresh button (also supports recaptcha and question mode). Automated blocking of offenders, limit account sharing and more features.

package.name: CB Auto Actions
package.description: Configure workflow related tasks around your community without coding. Send emails, private messages, update field values, change Joomla ACL group, execute database queries and even more actions when a specific event happens. Powerful tool to make awesome things happen in your community.

package.name: CB Auto Welcome
package.description: Send personalized email or private messages to your users when they join your website. Great way to welcome your new users and get them up to speed with your website. Also supports automated connection requests.

package.name: CB Conditional
package.description: Dynamically show or hide CB fields or entire tabs depending on other field data. Great way to personalize your CB registration form and user profiles for your community. Very powerful concept lets you fine tune data entry.

package.name: CB Connect
package.description: Let hundreds of millions of Facebook, Twitter, Google, Linkedin, Windows Live, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, Reddit, Twitch, Stack Exchange, Pinterest, Amazon, Yahoo, Paypal, Discus, WordPress, and Meetup users to directly and comfortably sign-in to your Community Builder powered website.

package.name: CB Core Fields Ajax
package.description: Make any core CB field be Ajax powered for inline editing (no need to edit profile). Install, publish and configure the fields you want to be inline editable.

package.name: CB Footer Removal
package.description: Authorization to remove all Powered by Community Builder footer links from all your websites for CB 2.x.

package.name: CB Gallery
package.description: Image, video, music and file galleries can be added by members in their profiles. Easy and simple with powerful quota system. Media can also be moderated before final publication.

package.name: CB Google Translate
package.description: This plugin will add a language drop-down selector to your CB Login module and translate your website using google service. Very useful for multi-language audiences.

package.name: CB Gravatar Field
package.description: Use your Gravatar images as a CB field based on email address of user. You can specify default image to show if user does not have Gravatar account.

package.name: CB Invites
package.description: Empower your members to invite their friends to your website. Easy to configure. Lets your members send personalized invitations to their friends with unique invitation codes.

package.name: CB Last Views Tab
package.description: Add a new tab to your profiles to let members see who has been visiting their profile! Also has administrative view with filtering.

package.name: CB Privacy
package.description: Extensive privacy controls for members and administrators. Applies to any CB field and CB Tab. Lets users remove their account by themselves and many more features.

package.name: CB Profile Update Logger
package.description: Keep track of who changed what and when in their user profile. This script will produce a FILO list of profile updates for each user profile. Email notifications are also sent to CB Moderators on each profile update action.

package.name: CB ProfileBook
package.description: Guestbook, blog and/or wall tabs can be added to profiles. Let your members communicate with this powerful 3-in-1 add-on. Package includes Latest Entries module.

package.name: CB Progress Field
package.description: This plugin allows you to create a CB progress field to show your members what their profile completeness progress is. Allows you to select fields to track and shows a nice progress bar. Create as many progress fields as you want.

package.name: CB Code Field
package.description: Lets you execute your PHP code and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported. You can also chain fields to force re-execution or PHP code when a field value is updated.

package.name: CB Query Field
package.description: Lets you grab data using a database query and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported and you can also validate entries of existing fields against database queries.

package.name: CB Reconfirm Email
package.description: Force users to reconfirm email each time they change their CB user profile email address. Users can revert change from their old email address or finalize confirmation from new email address.

package.name: CB Template Changer
package.description: Allow users to change the profile CB template as they please. Users can select if profile setting is to apply only for them or even for all users viewing user's profile.

package.name: CB GroupJive
package.description: Take your Community to the next social level by empowering your users to organize themselves into common interest groups. Sit back and watch your community interact, socialize and expand your community by inviting their friends to their groups and your website. This is the main CB GroupJive plugin.

package.name: CB GroupJive About
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive About plugin that renders the tooltip description for each group.

package.name: CB GroupJive Events
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Events plugin that supports the events tab functionality for groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive File
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Files plugin that supports the group file sharing functionality.

package.name: CB GroupJive Forums
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Forum plugin that integrates with the Kunena forum extension (installed separately) giving private forum discussions for group members.

package.name: CB GroupJive Photo
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Photo plugin that supports photo sharing in groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive Video
package.description: This is the GroupJive Video plugin that supports video sharing in groups.

package.name: CB GroupJive Wall
package.description: This is the CB GroupJive Wall plugin that supports wall discussions in groups.

package.name: CBSubs Rounded Template
package.description: This is the rounded template plugin for CBSubs. It lets you change the look of your plan offerings.

package.name: CBSubs AcyMailing
package.description: This is a CBSubs integration plugin for the AcyMailing newsletter extension.

package.name: CBSubs CB Fields
package.description: This is the CBSubs Integration Plugin for CB Fields. It integrates with CB and lets you change the values of a CB Field based on subscription activations/deactivations.

package.name: CBSubs Content
package.description: This is the CBSubs Integration plugin for Joomla content, It lets you protect Joomla content requiring specific plan subscriptions to access. The CBSubs bot (Joomla plugin) is needed to make this protection work.

package.name: CBSubs Email
package.description: This is the CBSubs Email Integration plugin. It extends the email notification functionality of CBSubs to support more subscription related events.

package.name: CBSubs Fields Tabs Protection
package.description: This is the CBSubs Fields/Tabs Protection Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB and lets you protect CB Tabs and Fields to require specific CBSubs Plans for viewing or access.

package.name: CBSubs Folder Access
package.description: This is the CBSubs Folder Access Integration plugin. Lets CBSubs protect access to webserver folders (apache server).

package.name: CBSubs Google Analytics
package.description: CBSubs Google Analytics Integration Plugin. It integrates with Google Analytics services letting it track your business traffic.

package.name: CBSubs GroupJive
package.description: CBSubs GroupJive Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB GroupJive and lets you automatically add users to specific GroupJive groups based on a CBSubs plan subscription.

package.name: CBSubs iDevAffiliate
package.description: CBSubs idev affiliate Integration Plugin. It integrates with the Joomla idev affiliates extension.

package.name: CBSubs Mailer
package.description: CBSubs Mailer Plugin. Adds automated, programmable, personal email messaging functionality to your CBSubs Solution environment. Needs CBSubs Tax plugin to function.

package.name: CBSubs Piwiki
package.description: CBSubs piwiki Integration Plugin. Integrates with the open-source piwiki script.

package.name: CBSubs Plan Image
package.description: CBSubs Plan Image Integration Plugin. Integrates with CB and adds a new plan image field type.

package.name: CBSubs Post Affiliate Pro
package.description: CBSubs Postaffilate Pro Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Promotions
package.description: CBSubs Promotions Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs SQL Actions
package.description: CBSubs SQL Actions Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Tax
package.description: CBSubs Tax Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs URL
package.description: CBSubs URL Integration Plugin

package.name: CBSubs CCBill
package.description: CBSubs CCBill Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel
package.description: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs eWay
package.description: CBSubs eWay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Google Checkout
package.description: CBSubs Google Checkout Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus
package.description: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs PayPal Advanced
package.description: CBSubs Paypal Advanced Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs PayPal Pro
package.description: CBSubs Paypal Pro Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Payza
package.description: CBSubs Payza Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs QuickPay
package.description: CBSubs QuickPay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs Skrill
package.description: CBSubs Skrill Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay
package.description: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs 2Checkout
package.description: CBSubs TwhoCheckout Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: CBSubs World Pay
package.description: CBSubs World Pay Payment Processor Plugin

package.name: Community Builder
package.description: THIS IS FOR INSTALL FROM WEB ONLY.

package.name: CB Primer Book
package.description: Primer Book for Community Builder is a great way to get started and quickly leverage the basic functionality available.

package.name: CB GroupJive Primer Book
package.description: The GroupJive Primer Book is freely available to download. GroupJive itself needs a subscription to download.

package.name: CBSubs Manual
package.description: Comprehensive all inclusive guide to CBSubs includes many use case examples.
